message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. 70/30 split.  Take it before inflation eats away at your share!
I'm willing to give you a larger share this time, Alice. But we need to act quickly before inflation hits again.  Let's split it 60/40.
The clock is ticking, Bob. I'll offer you 350,000.  It's more than you would have gotten last round, even with the inflation. Don't get greedy!
